entry.title: Terra Founder Do Kwon Will Be Extradited to South Korea—Court Says It's Final
entry.summary: The August 1 ruling marks the conclusion of a protracted legal saga involving multiple appeals and judicial reversals on Kwon's extradition.

entry.title: Bybit to Exit From France’s Market as EU’s Crypto Regulation Takes Hold
entry.summary: From August 13, French users will be unable to transact on the exchange other than to withdraw funds, Bybit announced Thursday.

entry.title: Crypto Market Will Continue to Expand Over Next Two Years: Gemini
entry.summary: Monetary policy, regulatory shifts, and infrastructure developments will continue to drive growth in crypto, Gemini said Thursday.

entry.title: Marathon Digital Posts $200 Million Quarterly Loss Amid Bitcoin Mining Sector Woes
entry.summary: This year’s halving, coupled with increased global hash rates and equipment failures, greatly affected Marathon Digital's output, it said.

entry.title: Meet Flux: New Open-Source AI Image Generator Beats Midjourney, SD3 and Auraflow
entry.summary: Flux is an advanced, open-source text-to-image model with 12 billion parameters. We compare it to three top contenders, and one comes out on top.

entry.title: Google Ramps Up Fight Against AI Deepfakes in Search Results
entry.summary: In a new policy update, Google will demote and filter search results for websites with illicit AI-generated images.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Reports Q2 Loss, Boosts Bitcoin Holdings by $11 Million
entry.summary: Despite a quarterly net loss of $102.6 million, MicroStrategy continues to focus on its Bitcoin strategy, and now holds more than $14 billion in BTC.

entry.summary: Coinbase quarterly transaction revenue was $781 million, down 27% from the first three months of 2024.

entry.summary: Monthly dividends continue to climb, as the tokenized fund has paid out more than $7 million since launch.

entry.title: The Story of Solana Meme Coin Billy
entry.summary: Billy is the largest Solana meme coin on Pumpdotfun, peaking at a market cap of over $200 million. But it wasn’t always smooth sailing. Minutes after launching Billy’s dev abandoned him and sold the majority of their tokens. At the time, the tokens were worth $1,116 but at today’s value they’d be worth more than $8.65 million.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Do Crypto Degens Care About Being Scammed?
entry.summary: What's the Meta? With the rise of Pumpdotfun and rug pulls becoming a daily occurrence, why do crypto degens keep investing? Do these investors enjoy being scammed? It appears that people very often invest in meme coins that are very obviously going to rug pull. Once it happens, they just laugh it off on Twitter, is being scammed fun?!

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.
